column5: Beautiful safe and clean apartment complex. All major streets, westchase area, close to the bars and restaurants,convenient stores,a library and parks,wifi, TV.This is a 2 bedrooms high end apartment with pool and gym 24/7. 15 mintues away from Galleria Mall. Easy access to US-59, I-10, 610, Beltway 8, and public transportation (Metro Bus). My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers..
